mapper.select: select * from (select ROWNUM num, N.* from (select * from gitboard order by writedate desc) N) where num between #{startRowNum} and #{endRowNum}
select * from (select ROWNUM num, N.* from (select * from gitboard order by writedate desc) N) where num between #{startRowNum} and #{endRowNum} and title like '%'||#{title}||'%'
select count(*) from gitboard where title like '%'||#{title}||'%'
select writerid from gitboard where seq=#{seq}
select count(*) from gitboard where writerid=#{writerId}
mapper.update: update gitboard set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents} where seq=#{seq}
